availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: B. F. Delany (Morganfield, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace)

body.p: Morganfield, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary M. Delany. Father of Henrietta Delany, Sarah A. Delany, Anna Delany, and Georgianna Delany. Merchant in Morganfield in 1860. Justice of the peace in Union County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 206.
KYR-0001-020-1537.
